pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes unidentified material relating to CBS, 1947, to the debates Wise had with Clarence Darrow, 1927-1930, Father Lonegran, 1927-1928, Betrand Russell, 1931-1932 and Ben Lindsey, 1927-1928. Also material relating to Town Meeting of the Air, 1945, and Martha Deane, 1947-1948.
